5 j=0
10 if peek(12300)=11 then j=j+1
12 if peek(12333)=63 then j=j+2
14 if j>1 then goto 120
100 for s=0 to 7
105 for n=0 to 62:read dt
110 poke (192+s)*64+n,dt
115 next n:next s
120 poke 2040,192
125 poke 53248+0,160
130 poke 53248+1,131
135 poke 53248+21,1
140 x=peek(53248+0)
145 y=peek(53248+1)
200 rem program loop
205 d=int(rnd(1)*7)
210 r=int(rnd(1)*10)+5
215 poke 2040,192+d
220 for n=1 to r
225 if d=0 then x=x-2:y=y+0
230 if d=1 then x=x-2:y=y-2
234 if d=2 then x=x+0:y=y-2
240 if d=3 then x=x+2:y=y-2
245 if d=4 then x=x+2:y=y+0
250 if d=5 then x=x+2:y=y+2
255 if d=6 then x=x+0:y=y+2
260 if d=7 then x=x-2:y=y+2
261 if x>320 then x=320
262 if x<24 then  x=24
263 if y>255 then y=255
264 if y<48 then y=48
265 if x>255 then goto 290
266 print tab(r);"x"
270 p=peek(53248+16)
275 if p and not 1 then goto 285
280 poke 53248+16,peek(53248+16)andnot1
285 poke 53248+0,x
290 if x<256 then goto 310
295 if p and 1 then goto  310
300 poke53248+16,peek(53248+16)or1
305 poke 53248+0,x-256
310 poke 53248+1,y
315 next
325 goto 200
